mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectPrmAplGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PRM_NO , APL_TURN , GOD_APL_YN , APL_GOD_SECT_CD , BRND_ID , DSP_CTGRY_NO , GOD_NO , SESON_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM PRM_APL_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRM_NO = #{prmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND APL_TURN = #{aplTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
